name: sePUNky
description:
Demake games with Spelunky references, but with changes:

  1. Instead of a map that has random generation, objectives and goals that have random positions!
  2. It's 3D! (which means the character's movement is increasingly "free").

N.B: If you have trouble finding the Objective and Goals, there is a "Map" that can help you in the screenshot on the dashboard.

Credits:

  • Game Design    : Akhyar (https://catcatexe.itch.io/)
  • Programmer     : Dzulfickar Rheza (https://dzulfickaralgadhari.itch.io/)
  • 3D Artist            : Gilman Firdaus (https://itch.io/profile/gfshouse)
  • 2D Artist            : Andreas Pratama (https://andreas-pratama.itch.io/)

BGM's : https://opengameart.org/
